Hello, my name is Michael Ivanushkin. I am a sophmore at Staten Island Techincal Highschool, and I am taking Ap Cmputer Science. I live in Brookyn with my family and I carpool to get to school. For fun I like playig basketball, hanging out with friends, and listening to music.
